title: Bug 117981: Selection issue in library outline view
description: Description: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item does not get selected. However, on subsequent attempts, the item can be selected successfully.
OB: The label item is not selected when attempting to select it for the first time in the library outline view.
EB: On the second attempt to select the label item, it gets selected as expected.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Try to select the label item in the library outline view for the first time.
3. Observe that the label item does not get selected.
4. Try selecting the label item again (for the second time) in the library outline view.
5. Observe that the label item gets selected successfully.
